00046 class AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem : public QTreeWidgetItem, public KviHeapObject
00047 {
00048 public:
00049         enum Type { Alias, Namespace };
00050 public:
00051         AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem(QTreeWidget * pTreeWidget,Type eType,const QString &szName);
00052         AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem(AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem * pParentItem,Type eType,const QString &szName);
00053         ~AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem(){};
00054 protected:
00055         Type m_eType;
00056         AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem * m_pParentItem;
00057         QString m_szName;
00058         QString m_szBuffer;
00059         int  m_cPos;
00060 public:
00061         inline const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00062         void setName(const QString &szName);
00063         inline Type type(){ return m_eType; };
00064         void setType(Type t);
00065         inline bool isAlias(){ return m_eType == Alias; };
00066         inline bool isNamespace(){ return m_eType == Namespace; };
00067         void setParentItem(AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem* it){ m_pParentItem=it; };
00068         AliasEditorTreeWidgetItem * parentItem(){ return m_pParentItem; };
00069         inline void setBuffer(const QString &szBuffer){ m_szBuffer = szBuffer; };
00070         inline const QString & buffer(){ return m_szBuffer; };
00071         inline const int & cursorPosition(){return m_cPos; };
00072 
00073         void setCursorPosition(const int &cPos){ m_cPos = cPos; };
00074 };
